::Battera::

She could see that he was uncomfortable about something.  He wasn't going to 
tell her and she wasn't going to push it any further.  She knew he would 
tell her in time. No matter what is was.

"Bugs huh...oh well, the ship extermenation system should handle it then."  
She looked at her lunch and realized that she wasn't hungry.  She got up and 
tossed the food into the recepticle.  She walked back to Cybershark.  "I 
feel like taking a walk outside. Care to join me?" she said with a smile.


----Original Message----
From:   <Dachande85@a...>
Date: Thu Jul 6, 2000 4:04pm
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


::CyberShark::

    "No, everything's fine. There's just a bug infestation of our ship. I
gotta do some matenance so the cleaning systems will be back," CyberShark
said, knowing he was lying.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Magmatron::

    "Mantella, I need you to help me in attacking a really huge ship,"
Magmatron said. "This ship is 1.5 times larger than the Nemisis, and just as
powerful."
    He knew that she would be scared, he knew this because he was scared. "I
know this is a lot to ask, but you will not be going in with just yourself, 
I
will be there, and you will have a cloaking device and all the weaponry you
need."
